statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, likes, shares FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 10 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, likes, shares FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, likes FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 10 AND comments > 5 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(likes) AS max_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING MAX(likes) > 200;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_id, total_likes, total_shares, total_comments FROM post_metrics WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, likes, shares, comments FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) as total_engagements FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(likes) as total_likes, SUM(shares) as total_shares FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, p.post_id, u.likes, p.total_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics u JOIN post_metrics p ON u.post_id = p.post_id;
SELECT * FROM Post;
SELECT post_content FROM Post WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Post ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Post WHERE post_content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Post WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Post;
SELECT post_content FROM Post WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM Comment GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY num_comments DESC;
SELECT post_content, COUNT(like_id) AS num_likes FROM Post LEFT JOIN Like ON Post.post_id = Like.post_id GROUP BY Post.post_id ORDER BY num_likes DESC;
SELECT post_content, comment_text FROM Post JOIN Comment ON Post.post_id = Comment.post_id WHERE Post.post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_title, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE shares > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_title, likes FROM posts WHERE likes BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT post_title, shares FROM posts ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT post_title, likes, shares, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > shares;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_title, likes FROM posts WHERE shares < 50 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_title, likes, shares, comments FROM posts WHERE comments = 0 AND likes >= 50;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, u.username FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.likes > 200 AND p.post_id = u.user_id;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_likes > 10 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT post_id, user_id, count(*) as total_comments FROM post_comments GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_likes FROM user_likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 10;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = '123'
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '456'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM post_comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 5

SELECT p.post_id, u.name AS user_name, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN post_comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id GROUP BY p.post_id, u.name
